name: Runaway Kanye
description:
Set to the tune of Runaway by Kanye West, play as Kanye as you dodge penii and collect hearts. The jumping needs improvement. The aesthetic is based of the album art of Kanye West's Yeezus (yes I am aware Runaway is from My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy) Kanye's movement speed increases over time to match the song.

Move left and right with A and D, Jump with Space, Q to trade 3 hearts for 1 life, and R to restart.
